metadata.title: CVE-2024-41073 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme: avoid double free special payloadIf a discard request needs to be retried, and that retry may fail beforea new special payload is added, a double free will result. Clear theRQF_SPECIAL_LOAD when the request is cleaned.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-41073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16

linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1004-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
No subscription required
